website_summaries.verdict: The JLab Epic's booming bass won't be for everyone, but it delivers undistorted audio at a low price.
pros: Powerful audio with no distortion at top volumes
Inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Booming bass can overtake the balance of the mixâ€”these aren't for purists or fans of crisp, balanced audio

customer_reviews.title: Interference during a calls
customer_reviews.text: Superb headphones. But the one thing I really needed them for and that no one seems to test or comment on in reviews is call quality. I returned as there’s a bit of interference and it’s impossible to speak with both ears in. That said, just returned my Powerbeats 3 also as they are horrendous in calls, like calling from inside an electric razor whilst inside a washing machine
customer_reviews.author: Firms

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after less than 5 months of use light use
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked great for almost 5 months. Then repeatedly disconnected from my phone and tablet during use. Now they will not reconnect. Didn't even last 6 months. No option on Amazon to return after the first 6 weeks. Not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: I was happy on receiving
customer_reviews.text: I was happy on receiving, did what is said on the tin but that did not last long, battery problems. I got a refund and replaced with same but again they failed after about 3 months, contacted JLab who replaced, but they lasted about 5 months, sorry but for the price I would expect more, would not recommend anyone buying them, they just are not up to the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G A R Watt

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and hold. Great sound but not durable enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these headphones last year - the sound and fit were excellent but they died within a few months (unable to charge). I got a full refund and decided to try them again but this time they only lasted 3 weeks before completely failing again. Reading other reviews people have had the same issues. There is clearly a problem with this product. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not very good sound quality in my opinion ear phones for £5 at tesco sound a lot better
customer_reviews.author: David jarvis

customer_reviews.title: A lot of ££ for some fancy packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for running and needed something durable and waterproof, they broke after 3 months would never buy from this company again. That price is high but you don't get what you pay for I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael86

customer_reviews.title: Bad mic and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mic quality was very bad I couldn't hear a word on the other end and they aren't very comfortable in ear. I saw the YouTube video reviews say it was good but they just aren't
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Whooley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: They worked fine for about 6 months and the they stopped working after getting weat with sweat
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Best i have had so far
customer_reviews.text: Best for running. fits perfectly. Enjoying my fitness so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I only noticed these reviews after i bought the headphones . . .. typical. But I am personally happy with them and work well for me when MTB'ing. . . Not yet taken a call on that ride to know how well they handle wind etc but this was not something I was too fussed about.
customer_reviews.author: Beardy_Man

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and intermittent connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Stoped working after several months. No way to return as older than a month. Worked fine at first but then had connection issues and then stopped holding a change. Very frustrating and disappointing given they cost £100.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Herschell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The fit is terrible! You need to spend forever to try and adjust them. The sound is very disappointing and the music stops playing and you need to restart it every few seconds. This was a free gift from O2 with my Galaxy phone but they will be going in the bin!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet
customer_reviews.text: Really, really quiet..and annoying to get to fit the ear everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Proteus Duxbury

product_meta.title: Jlab Jbuds EPIC Earbuds with 13mm C3 Massive Drivers and Customizable Cushion Fins - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Wired| Colour Name:Black/GrayEPIC, Earbuds ReImagined Revolutionary Fit. Radical Sound. 8 Years. 1 EPIC pair of earbuds. That's right. The EPIC is the result of eight years of engineering, research and design. They're the new bad boy of sound - and they were created directly from customer feedback, reviews and industry know-how. 1,000 ways to rock. Comfortably. We straight ran out of ways to make old technology comfortable. So, we got innovative. Introducing Cush Fins, the revolutionary earbud system that guarantees a perfect fit and ear-lapping comfort. Coupled with seven gel tips, Cush Fins give you 1,000-plus formulas to fine-tune your listening setup. Whoa, this is big. Sound not forgotten. Just because they're comfortable doesn't mean they won't rattle your globe. The EPIC uses C3 technology to deliver clean, crisp sound no matter your flavor of music. Drench your ears in vibrant highs and song-defining mids - all delivered through Jlab's high-performance 13-mm drivers, the largest driver we've ever packed into an earbud! Built To Last Did we get carried away? Perhaps. But how epic would these earbuds be if they weren't built to last? Featuring a universal mic and simple track control, the flat, tangle-free cable offers additional strength when things get messy. Seriously, we tested these during a death match with a cobra, puma and liger. OK, no, we didn't. But they're pretty dang strong.

BOX CONTAINS
1x headphones
feature_bullets: Fully customized fit with CUSH FIN technology
Inline Mic with track and call control
